title: Sidewall, 1835–45
description: a) Small diamond diaper pattern. Printed in blue, brown and gray on white ground; b) Rococo-style with scenic medallions. Larger medallion containing ships in harbor, alternating with smaller medallion containing floral bouquet (?)Vertical stripe along right edge. Ivy growing over medallions and up vertical element at right edge of paper. Printed in green and brown, with grisaille medallions and stripe, on white ground. b) is very abraded.

tombstone.epitaph: Sidewall, 1835–45. Block-printed on machine-made paper. Gift of Thomas Strahan Company. 1976-46-26-a,b.
